instruction.value: Administer as loading dose over 90 to 120 minutes.
Administer as maintenance infusion over 24 hours.

AdditionalNotes.value: Administered as 2 doses, loading dose over 90 to 120 minutes, followed by equivalent dose administered over 24 hours.
CHILDREN > 20 kg, refer to ADULT dosing. Administered as 2 doses, loading dose over 90 to 120 minutes, followed by equivalent dose administered over 24 hours.

AHSFormularyStatus.value: Formulary with Restrictions. Health Canada Special Access Programme.
